display_help: You channel psionic energy into the body of your target, creating a false injury within their mind. The target takes psionic damage and experiences reduced regeneration. Their mind makes the pain of the injury real, causing the target to also suffer lethal damage over time.
display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and reduced regeneration.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
